languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} forces all enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} to run away from the Executioner in a straight line for up to 3 cells.
During this movement, the targets do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and leave a bloody trail on the ground, which remains until the end of combat.
Movement through these bloodstained cells costs the Executioner 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Next Melee attack forces all enemies hit to move away from the Executioner for 3 cells in a straight line, or until the first obstacle.
During this movement they leave a blood trail on the ground until the end of combat, and it does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
Moving on these cells costs 0 MP for Executioner.

The Executioner's next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} forces all enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} to move away from the Executioner in a straight line for up to 3 cells.
During this movement, the targets do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and leave a bloody trail on the ground which remains until the end of combat.
Movement through these bloodstained cells costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for the Executioner.

The Executioner's next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} forces all enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} to move away from the Executioner in a straight line for up to 3 cells.
During this movement, the targets do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and leave a bloody trail on the ground which remains until the end of combat.
Movement through these bloodstained cells costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for the Executioner.

The Executioner's next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} forces all enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} to run away from the Executioner in a straight line for up to 3 cells.
During this movement, the targets do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and leave a bloody trail on the ground, which remains until the end of combat.
Movement through these bloodstained cells costs the Executioner 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} forces all enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} to run away from the Executioner in a straight line for up to 3 cells.
During this movement, the targets do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and leave a bloody trail on the ground, which remains until the end of combat.
Movement through these bloodstained cells costs the Executioner 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} forces all enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} to run away from the Executioner in a straight line for up to 3 cells.
During this movement, the targets do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and leave a bloody trail on the ground, which remains until the end of combat.
Movement through these bloodstained cells costs the Executioner 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

languages.text:
El próximo {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} fuerza a todos los enemigos {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactados{/g} a huir de él en línea recta hasta 3 casillas.
Durante este movimiento, los objetivos no provocan {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} y dejan un rastro de sangre en el suelo que permanece hasta el final del combate.
El movimiento por las casillas ensangrentadas cuesta 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} para el ejecutor.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} forces all enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} to run away from the Executioner in a straight line for up to 3 cells.
During this movement, the targets do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and leave a bloody trail on the ground, which remains until the end of combat.
Movement through these bloodstained cells costs the Executioner 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
El próximo {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} fuerza a todos los enemigos {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactados{/g} a huir de él en línea recta hasta 3 casillas.
Durante este movimiento, los objetivos no provocan {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} y dejan un rastro de sangre en el suelo que permanece hasta el final del combate.
El movimiento por las casillas ensangrentadas cuesta 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} para el ejecutor.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}の次の{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}が敵に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}すると、そのすべての敵がエクスキューショナーから最大3セル分、直線で逃げ出す。
この移動中、ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発させず、血がついた足跡を地面に残す。これは戦闘終了まで残る。
血がついたセルを通過する時、エクスキューショナーの消費{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}は0になる。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} forces all enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} to run away from the Executioner in a straight line for up to 3 cells.
During this movement, the targets do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and leave a bloody trail on the ground, which remains until the end of combat.
Movement through these bloodstained cells costs the Executioner 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}の次の{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}が敵に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}すると、そのすべての敵がエクスキューショナーから最大3セル分、直線で逃げ出す。
この移動中、ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発させず、血がついた足跡を地面に残す。これは戦闘終了まで残る。
血がついたセルを通過する時、エクスキューショナーの消費{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}は0になる。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}的下次{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}会迫使所有被{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}的敌人以直线方式逃离行刑者，最多移动3格。
此次移动不会引发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}，但会在地面上留下血迹，效果持续至战斗结束。
行刑者在这样的血迹上移动时，不会消耗任何{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} forces all enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} to run away from the Executioner in a straight line for up to 3 cells.
During this movement, the targets do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and leave a bloody trail on the ground, which remains until the end of combat.
Movement through these bloodstained cells costs the Executioner 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}的下次{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}会迫使所有被{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}的敌人以直线方式逃离行刑者，最多移动3格。
此次移动不会引发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}，但会在地面上留下血迹，效果持续至战斗结束。
行刑者在这样的血迹上移动时，不会消耗任何{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。

languages.text:
Der nächste {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henkers{/g} zwingt alle {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffenen{/g} Gegner zur Flucht vor dem Henker in einer geraden Linie von bis zu 3 Zellen.
Während dieser Bewegung provozieren die Ziele keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} und hinterlassen am Boden eine blutige Spur, die bis zum Ende des Kampfes bestehen bleibt.
Bewegungen über diese blutbefleckten Zellen kosten den Henker 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} forces all enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} to run away from the Executioner in a straight line for up to 3 cells.
During this movement, the targets do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and leave a bloody trail on the ground, which remains until the end of combat.
Movement through these bloodstained cells costs the Executioner 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Der nächste {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g}s zwingt alle {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffenen{/g} Gegner zur Flucht vor dem Henker in einer geraden Linie von bis zu 3 Zellen.
Während dieser Bewegung provozieren die Ziele keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} und hinterlassen am Boden eine blutige Spur, die bis zum Ende des Kampfes bestehen bleibt.
Bewegungen über diese blutbefleckten Zellen kosten den Henker 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.

languages.text:
La prochaine {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} oblige tous les ennemis {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchés{/g} à s'éloigner à un maximum de 3 cases de l'exécuteur en ligne droite.
Pendant ce déplacement, les cibles ne provoquent pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} et laissent derrière elles une trace sanglante qui persiste jusqu'à la fin du combat.
Se déplacer sur ces cases tachées de sang ne coûte aucun {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} à l'exécuteur.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} forces all enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} to run away from the Executioner in a straight line for up to 3 cells.
During this movement, the targets do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and leave a bloody trail on the ground, which remains until the end of combat.
Movement through these bloodstained cells costs the Executioner 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
La prochaine {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} oblige tous les ennemis {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchés{/g} à s'éloigner à un maximum de 3 cases de l'exécuteur en ligne droite.
Pendant ce déplacement, les cibles ne provoquent pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} et laissent derrière elles une trace sanglante qui persiste jusqu'à la fin du combat.
Se déplacer sur ces cases tachées de sang ne coûte aucun {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} à l'exécuteur.

languages.text:
Следующая атака {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палача{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} заставляет противников, получивших {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, отбежать от палача по прямой на расстояние до 3 клеток, не провоцируя {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}.
Эти противники оставляют за собой кровавый след, который сохраняется до конца боя.
Перемещение по клеткам, залитым кровью таким образом, не требует для палача затрат {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} forces all enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} to run away from the Executioner in a straight line for up to 3 cells.
During this movement, the targets do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and leave a bloody trail on the ground, which remains until the end of combat.
Movement through these bloodstained cells costs the Executioner 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Следующая атака {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палача{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} заставляет противников, получивших {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, отбежать от палача по прямой на расстояние до 3 клеток,
не провоцируя {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}. Эти противники оставляют за собой кровавый след, который сохраняется до конца боя.
Перемещение по клеткам, залитым кровью таким образом, не требует для палача затрат {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.

Следующая атака {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палача{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} заставляет противников, получивших {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, отбежать от палача по прямой на расстояние до 3 клеток,
не провоцируя {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}. Эти противники оставляют за собой кровавый след, который сохраняется до конца боя.
Перемещение по клеткам, залитым кровью таким образом, не требует для палача затрат {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Cellat{/g}'ın bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurulan{/g} tüm düşmanları Cellat'tan düz bir çizgide en fazla 3 hücre uzağa kaçmaya zorlar.
Hedefler, bu hareket esnasında {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırısı{/g} tetiklemezler ve yerde çatışma sonuna dek kalan kanlı birer iz bırakırlar.
Cellat, kana bulanan bu hücrelerden geçerken 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} harcar.

During this movement, the targets do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and leave a bloody trail on the ground, which remains until the end of combat.
Movement through these bloodstained cells costs the Executioner 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
